Song.title: Just As I Am (I Come)
Song.copyright: Charlotte Elliott, David Moffitt, Sue C. Smith, Travis Cottrell, William Bradbury

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: Just [A]as I am, with[E/A]out one pl[A]ea But t[E/A]hat Thy b[E7/A]lood was s[D/A]hed for [A]me And t[A]hat Thou bidst me c[D/A]ome to Thee O L[A]amb of God, I c[E/A]ome, I c[A]ome [D/A] [A] [D/A]
Verse 2: Just [A]as I am, and [E/A]waiting n[A]ot To [E/A]rid my [E7/A]soul of [D/A]one dark b[A]lot To T[A]hee whose blood can cl[D/A]eanse each spot O L[A]amb of God, I c[E/A]ome, I c[A]ome [D/A] [A] [D/A]
Chorus: I come b[F#m]roken to be me[D]nded, I come wo[A]unded to be h[E]ealed I come de[F#m]sperate to be re[D]scued, I come e[A]mpty to be f[E]illed I come g[F#m]uilty to be pa[D]rdoned by the b[A]lood of Christ the L[D]amb And I'm we[D]lcomed with [F#m]open arms Praise G[D]od, just [E]as I a[A]m [D/A] [A] [D/A]
Verse 3: Just [A]as I am, I w[E/A]ould be l[A]ost But m[E/A]ercy and [E7/A]grace my f[D/A]reedom bo[A]ught And n[A]ow to glory [D/A]in Your cross O L[A]amb of God, I c[E/A]ome, I c[A]ome [D/A] [A] [D/A]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 just as i am without one plea but that thy blood was shed for me and that thou bidst me come to thee o lamb of god i come i come verse 2 just as i am and waiting not to rid my soul of one dark blot to thee whose blood can cleanse each spot o lamb of god i come i come chorus i come broken to be mended i come wounded to be healed i come desperate to be rescued i come empty to be filled i come guilty to be pardoned by the blood of christ the lamb and im welcomed with open arms praise god just as i am verse 3 just as i am i would be lost but mercy and grace my freedom bought and now to glory in your cross o lamb of god i come i come
Arrangement.album: Travis Cottrell: When The Stars Burn Down
